attributes.action: Give the british public the right to have a vote in the Referendum of the European Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should be forced by the British People to hold a Referendum on the European Constitution before this Government gives away any more of our rights to Europe on foreign policy, defence, taxation and social security etc. The back door policy on Europe of this government is costing the tax payer millions, just to create something that the majority of this country loathe. I lobby this government to the right to a vote to settle the ongoing debate and waste of TAX PAYERS MONEY..!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
